io.hekate.lock

Interface LockRegion


  • public interface LockRegion
    Lock region.

    This interface represents a lock region within the LockService. For more details about locks and regions please see the documentation of LockService interface.

    See Also:
    LockService

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ClusterView cluster()
      Returns the cluster view of this region.
      DistributedLock get(String name)
      Returns the distributed lock for the specified name.
      String name()
      Returns the name of this region.
      Optional<LockOwnerInfo> ownerOf(String name)
      Returns information about the node that is currently holding the specified lock.

    • Method Detail

      • name

        String name()
        Returns the name of this region.
        Returns:
        Name of this region.
        See Also:
        LockService.region(String), LockRegionConfig.setName(String)

      • get

        DistributedLock get(String name)
        Returns the distributed lock for the specified name.

        The returned lock object is in unlocked state. Consider using one of its lock() method to actually obtain the lock. After lock is not needed anymore it can be released via unlock() method and will be automatically unregistered from the region.

        Parameters:
        name - Lock name.
        Returns:
        Lock instance.

      • ownerOf

        Optional<LockOwnerInfo> ownerOf(String name)
                         throws InterruptedException
        Returns information about the node that is currently holding the specified lock.

        Note that this operation requires a network round trip to the lock manager node and there are no guarantees that lock owner will not change by the time when result is returned from this method.

        Parameters:
        name - Lock name.
        Returns:
        Lock owner.
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - Signal that current thread was interrupted while awaiting for lock owner information.

      • cluster

        ClusterView cluster()
        Returns the cluster view of this region.
        Returns:
        Cluster view of this region.
